name: Dog Sim Online: Build A Family
name_original: Dog Sim Online: Build A Family
description:
Live the life of a dog, controlling your favourite breeds, exploring a massive 3D world and building a family of puppies.

Embody your favourite dog breeds as you hunt and explore with friends. Join online players to fight, eat and level up together! Customize your virtual dog to look however you like, and pass on your genes with a new family. Unlock all dog breeds and become the most powerful dog!

DOG SIM FEATURES:

YOUR FAVORITE DOG BREEDS
- Husky
- Dalmatian
- Daschund
- Doberman
- Boxer
- German Shepherd
- And many more!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
- Adventure with dogs from around the world, playing and exploring together
- Meet your friends online to explore together
- Battle in multiplayer duels to prove your strength

MASSIVE 3D WORLD
- Explore 6 unique locations, each with its own weather and ambiance
- Head into the city or explore the countryside with your friends
- Meet new enemies and allies

SIMULATION GAMEPLAY
- Play and explore in an in-depth simulator. Feel what it’s really like to be a dog
- Adventure in a real simulation complete with multiple locations and weather types

BUILD A FAMILY
- Breed puppies to start a whole family of dogs
- Protect your dogs from the wild
- Each of your puppies is a whole new character that you can customize and play
- Raise an all-new generation of dogs

DOG CUSTOMIZATION
- Customize your dogs with breed, name and gender

RPG UPGRADES
- Level up by fighting enemies to strengthen your dog
- Upgrade your dog’s Power, Speed and Health
- Fight dangerous new bosses

CLOUD SAVING
- Save to the Cloud to back up your characters when you register with an account
- Never lose your progress or miss a save
- Experience continuous gameplay across all of your devices

3D WORLD MAP
- Explore a simulation so huge that it demands a whole new type of 3D map. Zoom in and out, rotate any way you want, and even use the compass
- Set markers to easily navigate the world

WEATHER AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
- Experience real weather with accurate and detailed levels of rainfall and thunder
- Play all day and night with a 24-hour based time system. For every minute the game is played, a full hour passes in-game

DOG FACTS AND ACHIEVEMENTS
- Unlock achievements by hunting specific enemies
- Discover amazing facts about dogs

CLANS AND LEADERBOARDS
- Form clans and fight other players in Clan Wars
- See who has the most Clan War points, highest level and best duel score in the leaderboards

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
- See when friends are online so you can join their pack

Download Dog Sim Online and build your dog family!

Have fun playing Dog Sim!

If you have any suggestions or ideas for the game - contact us please:
support@turborocketgames.com
We are getting happier with each of your email message.

Please note, that we are in no way affiliated with any other animal simulator games developed by other game companies.
